title: BBC Local Live: Nottinghamshire on Monday 19 December 2016 - BBC News
summary: four jailed over hyson green death .
man who died on m1 on friday named .
new notts county owner given under two months to pay tax bill .
armed robberies in radcliffe and new basford .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from local live .
join us again tomorrow .

text: it 'll be a cloudy night with some drizzle possible throughout the night .
there 's the chance of a few mist patches in places .
lows of 4c ( 39f ) - it may be a little cooler in rural spots .

BBC Weather

documents.title: level crossings consultation extended
text: three pedestrian level crossings along the train line between beeston and attenborough could be closed , it 's been revealed .
network rail is consulting with residents , who are claiming they have n't been given enough time to respond .
broxtowe mp anna soubry tweeted
have contacted @ twitterid they 've agreed public consultation re # attenborough x 's extended jan 25 public meeting feb 8 .
email me for more
@ twitterid @ twitterid some positive news for once @ twitterid
@ gailsman pls ask users to email crne @ networkrail.co.uk & oppose plans .
consultation extended after i intervened @ twitterid

author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: four jailed over hyson green stabbing
text: four men have been jailed for a total of 36 years and 10 months for the manslaughter of a man stabbed in nottingham .
the four , all from nottingham and aged between 18 and 24 , have been jailed this afternoon at nottingham crown court .
it follows the death of aqib mazhar , who died from a single stab wound to his chest on his own street in hyson green in june of this year .
author: James Roberson
Reporter, East Midlands Today

documents.title: watch : 'i 've let trews down ' - sheridan
text: `` i feel as though i 've let ray and aileen trew down , '' says notts county manager , john sheridan , on the day the trews agreed a deal to sell the club to alan hardy .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: inquests to open into borrowash and m1 deaths
text: inquests into the deaths of claire and vincent nagle will be opened at 14:00 tomorrow at derby coroner 's court , police have said .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : m1 clear after fire
text: all lanes are running following recovery of a car involved in an earlier vehicle fire on # m1 btwn j28 - j29 n/b .
thanks for your patience
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: armed raid at newsagents
text: police have just told us about another recent armed robbery - this time in new basford .
it happened at jaspal news in nottingham road on friday about 13:30 .
a masked teenager , holding what was described as a gun , demanded the shop owner put money from the till into a bag .
after leaving the shop the robber , described as asian and aged between 16 to 18 , was believed to have met a second man and they both made off towards chard street .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: magpies : transfer embargo still in place
text: despite today 's news at notts county , the transfer embargo remains in place until the debt is paid in full .
once it 's paid before the end of the year they will be able to sign players in january .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: m1 death man named
text: the man who died on the m1 , near trowell services , on friday has been named as vincent nagle .
the 44-year-old , from station road , borrowash died after colliding with a lorry on the motorway at about 11:30 .
derbyshire police said his death was linked to the murder of claire nagle , in station road in the village about half an hour earlier .
nathan paton , 22 , who was injured at the house remains in the queen 's medical centre , where he is receiving treatment for head injuries , believed to have been caused by a nail gun .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: dog starts fire in kitchen
text: you read that right .
and no , it did n't leave the chip pan on after getting back from the pub .
the pesky pooch climbed on top of a cooker in a sandiacre kitchen , turning the electric hob on , firefighters believe .
it then knocked a bin over , which caught fire at about midnight on saturday .
luckily the smoke alarm sounded and the homeowner and her clumsy pet escaped to safety , where they were given oxygen treatment by firefighters from long eaton and stapleford stations .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'stolen ' ring and safe found
text: do you recognise this ring or this safe ?
police said they were found at properties in new basford and are believed to be stolen .
the ring has a thin dark glass or semi-precious gem coating over it .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: m1 car fire : lane opens
text: 1 lane has now been re-opened following an earlier car fire .
1 lane remains closed on # m1 btwn j28 - j29 n/b whilst vehicle awaits recovery
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: armed robbery in radcliffe
text: a masked man armed with what police described as a `` small handgun '' robbed the tesco store in radcliffe-on-trent last night .
he made off with cash after threatening a staff member at about 22:00 .
the robber was described as white , 5ft 8in tall , slim , aged 16 to 25 , wearing all black clothing and a balaclava .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: magpies given two months to pay tax bill
text: after agreeing to buy notts county , alan hardy has been given until 6 february to pay the outstanding tax bill .
the case at the high court has been adjourned until then .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: m1 fire : picture
text: although it looks like it 's out now , you can see what 's causing the problem here
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: southwell tree pipped to title
text: there 'll be no notts representative in next year 's european tree of the year contest , it was revealed over the weekend .
southwell 's original bramley apple tree lost out to northumberland 's famous sycampore gap at hadrian 's wall .
i know .
gutting .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: worrall questions forest desire
text: worrall questions forest desire

documents.title: notts mp launches 'listening tour '
text: gedling 's vernon coaker is off round the country to hear from labour voters
labour has some difficult questions to answer and challenges to meet .
i 'll be launching a listening tour in the new year to hear from voters
as britain changes labour needs to change too in a way which reflects our values & principals - this starts with listening and learning .
how about listening to this , do n't have a terrorist sympathiser as leader , we do n't need another tory guv because of him
get rid of corbyn and his useless cohorts .
good luck vernon , do you think everyone will just take the message they want to hear from this exercise ?
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: magpies supporters ' trust welcome 'true fan '
text: notts county supporters ' trust has welcomed the sale of the club to a `` true supoprter '' .
trust chair mike scott said it was great news for the club and fans .

`` the rumours flying about have not helped the situation and the whole matter should have been resolved when ray trew first announced that the club was for sale instead of being allowed to drag on and on , '' he said .
`` we have always said that notts county needs to be owned by a true supporter and alan hardy is certainly one of those ! ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'a nasty attack '
text: this was a particularly nasty attack where severe violence has been used to injure these two brothers , leaving one of them in a very serious condition in hospital and i am pleased that , thanks to the strength of the evidence involved , they have all been brought to justice . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: first brother attacked at takeaway
text: all six men pleaded guilty , apart from ufaan hussain , who was found guilty at a trial in november .
a seventh man waqas iqbal , from sneinton , was found not guilty .
iqbal and ghaffor beat the first victim at trent s takeaway on 2 may .
on 3 may usman riaz , husnain riaz , ummar hussain and ufaan hussain attacked the other brother at his house .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: six sentenced after attacks on brothers
text: six men have been sentenced after two brothers were left with severe injuries in two attacks in west bridgford .
one of the men suffered a broken arm and the next day his brother was left with a fractured skull and dislocated shoulder in may .
here are the sentences given out on friday at nottingham crown court
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

panthers won 5-2 at the national ice centre but despite the victory , they 're still 16 points behind the devils in the league table .

documents.title: magpies news 'best way to start the week '
text: largely positive response to the news about notts county 's new owner this morning
breaking : # notts county to have a new owner , as alan hardy agrees to buy the club .
hardy will also ensure the hmrc debt is settled .
good for county .
as a forest fan , i do not wish notts any harm as a club .
personally , i would like to see them do well .
not many forest fans have issues with county - it 's just the other way around .
past success breeds jealousy .
breaking : # notts county to have a new owner , as alan hardy agrees to buy the club .
hardy will also ensure the hmrc debt is settled .
that is the best way to start a monday ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !

hardy will also ensure the hmrc debt is settled .

just outside the queen street post office .
no disruption at all .

documents.title: post office strike action could hit local branches
text: crown post office branches in nottingham and mansfield could be hit by strike action today .
around 3,000 staff nationally are expected to join the walkout in the dispute over jobs , pensions , and branch closures .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

traffic signal restored : meadow lane / daleside road roundabout
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: borrowash attacks : 'ordinary lovely , loving family '
text: the reverend timothy sumpter , from st stephens church in borrowash , said although he never met the family he 's spoken to many people who knew them .
`` the impression that i get is of an ordinary lovely , loving family that would do anything for you and were therefore liked a lot and had a very strong network of friends within the community . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: borrowash deaths : village left in shock
text: reverend sumpter said the village was in shock and that one of his parishioners , who came to nathan 's aid , was left traumatised .
he said : `` these things when they happen anytime of year they 're so tragic but particularly this time of year , leading up to christmas .
`` someone from our church here was involved in offering first aid .
`` she had her baby with her and she offered the blanket from the baby for the son who was severly injured .
it 's going to take people a long time to get over the trauma of these tragic events . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: listen : 'frenzied discussions ' over new owner
text: listen : 'frenzied discussions ' over new owner
author: Colin Slater
BBC Radio Nottingham Sport commentator

documents.title: trew 'incredibly proud '
text: here 's what outgoing notts county owner ray trew had to say

in handing over the reins of this great club , i am comfortable in saying that i have always given my all to the betterment of the world 's oldest football league club and whilst things have n't always gone as i would have liked , i have enjoyed some incredibly memorable moments during my time at meadow lane and leave the club feeling incredibly proud of the fact that the fans still have a club that they can believe in and support on to bigger and better things in the future . ''
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: here 's what 's making the news this morning
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'if not for baz , i 'd be in prison '
text: marcellus baz had hopes of being a pro boxer but that dream ended aged 23 when he was stabbed in the hand by a rival gang member .
he turned his back on gangs and focussed instead on helping others .
bryer wheatley , one of the young people baz has helped , said : `` when i was younger i used to be on the streets , carrying weapons , and i was involved in crime .
i had no future .
baz has got me into college .
`` he got me a part-time job and put me on the right track .
i have even become a national junior boxing champion and have aspirations of going to the olym one day .
if it were n't for baz , my mum and dad would have thrown me out and i would have ended up in prison . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: baz 's work 'life-changing '
text: marcellus 's voluntary work totally bowled over the judging panel .
nottinghamshire police and crime commissioner paddy tipping told us youngsters listen to baz because they can relate to him .
his work is a real life changer and the effect of it on breaking the cycle of crime is immeasurable and the judges could see why .
author: Natalie Jackson
BBC East Midlands sports editor

documents.title: baz wins spoty unsung hero
text: a massive well done to boxing club founder marcellus baz , who was named the bbc get inspired unsung hero at the sports personality of the year awards last night .
baz , 41 , provides free classes to hundreds of young people at the notttingham school of boxing .
here 's the moment he up the award last night
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: borrowash attacks : 'he was just thinking purely of his family '
text: local tattooist taz daley told bbc radio derby he tried to help nathan while they waited for an ambulance .
`` he was n't delirious he just basically said this has happened and that he needed to get back there , he 'd got younger brothers and sisters and he needed to get back to look after them .
`` he was n't thinking of himself even though he was in such bad condition , he was just thinking purely of his family , '' mr daley said .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : second sneinton lights failure
text: lights are also out at the colwick road-meadow lane junction .
traffic signal failure : meadow lane / daleside road roundabout

documents.title: borrowash deaths : son 'attacked with a nail gun '
text: a man found with horrific facial injuries in borrowash on friday told people who went to help him he 'd been attacked with a nail gun , bbc radio derby reports .
the 22-year-old , who has been named locally , as nathan paton was found wandering the street covered in blood .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: borrowash death : woman named
text: police have named the woman who was killed in borrowash on friday as 38-year-old claire nagle .
she died after being assaulted on charnwood avenue on friday .
derbyshire police are linking the attack to the death of a 44-year-old man , named locally as vincent nagle , who was hit by a lorry on the m1 .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hardy 'will sort magpies ' debt '
text: as part of the deal , hardy said he will ensure the debt to hmrc is settled after an overdue tax bill had led to a winding-up petition , which was due to be heard in the high court on monday .
hardy said : `` i wish to emphasise my passion , desire and commitment to all notts county supporters to drive this club forward . ''

documents.title: notts county has new owner
